update public.users
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail_address = #{mailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update public.users set password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail_address = #{mailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, account_non_locked = #{accountNonLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, account_non_expired = #{accountNonExpired,jdbcType=BIT}, account_expiration_date = #{accountExpirationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, credentials_non_expired = #{credentialsNonExpired,jdbcType=BIT}, login_failed_count = #{loginFailedCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, last_login_date = #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_insert_datetime = #{recInsertDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_insert_user = #{recInsertUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_update_datetime = #{recUpdateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_update_user = #{recUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT R.NAME as role FROM ROLES R JOIN ROLES_USERS RU on R.id = RU.role_id JOIN USERS U on U.id = RU.user_id JOIN ROLE_PERMISSIONS RP ON RP.roles_id = R.id JOIN PERMISSIONS P ON P.id = RP.permissions_id WHERE U.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
